attributes.action: To Make financial security for those haemophiliacs infected with hepatitis C from contaminated NHS  Blood product.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Haemophilia community of the U.K have suffered infections of several blood born viruses, two  that have proven fatal and now a possible third, nvCJD.
Over 2000 deaths as a result of infected NHS blood product treatment, another 3000 haemophiliacs face the same painful end to their lives, Lord Peter Archer published a report after a two year independent public inquiry, in this report Lord Archer made several recommendations, the government has failed to take action on any of the recommendations Lord Archer requested.
We now request that Lord Archer's report be once again reviewed with a view of implementing all the recommendations Lord Archer recommended.
